short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your grades quickly with this Chrome extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MCVSD PowerSchool allows students in the Monmouth County Vocational School District to quickly view their grades as a Chrome Extension. This Chrome Extension will always appear at the top right of the Chrome Browser. With this extension, less time will be wasted navigating to get to this the PowerSchool page.
